text: Kharan () is a district in the north-west of Balochistan province of Pakistan. ==Administration== The district is administratively broken up into the following tehsils: * Kharan Tehsil * Sar Kharan Tehsil * Toumulk Tehsil * Besima Tehsil * Mashkel Tehsil * Nag Tehsil * Wasuk Tehsil
title: Kharan District
